DataElement.preferredDefinition: The non-numeric value of the vital sign or anthropomorphic measurement being recorded.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Vital signs (such as height, weight, and blood pressure) directly measure an individual's current state of attributes.:Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Vital signs (such as height, weight, and blood pressure) directly measure an individual's current state of attributes.

Concepts.definition: Vital signs (such as height, weight, and blood pressure) directly measure an individual's current state of attributes.

Property.preferredDefinition: Measurement; the size or magnitude of something.

Concepts.definition: Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Any specific activity undertaken during the course of a clinical study or research protocol.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 3/8/2023 Updated Property to use Released Measurement Concept

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A number with no fractional part.::40_An expression consisting of a linear sequence of symbols (characters or words or phrases)._An expression consisting of a linear sequence of symbols (characters or words or phrases).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A number with no fractional part.::40:An expression consisting of a linear sequence of symbols (characters or words or phrases).:Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
An expression consisting of a linear sequence of symbols (characters or words or phrases).

ValueDomain.origin: ACRIN:American College of Radiology Imaging Network
ValueDomain.changeDescription: 12/15/08 - released for use in C3D MGH Imaging trial.  7/08 - created to support ACRIN Breast CDEs
